name: Mycelium Pt. 1
description:
Two college students find a pet rabbit in the woods. Things ensue.

--

This is more of a little bit of writing and an outline than a cohesive story, I'd advise against playing unless you want most of it spoiled for you.

On the other hand if you want to take a look at our thought process and see what we have so far feel free to.

This version is kind of linear. The final one should be less so, or at least trick you into thinking it is.

Update: All right, there's a cohesive story now!

Granted it ends on a cliff hanger (sorry about that) but the second half is planned to work differently, so I thought it might be worth packaging them separately.
